author: vmassol
msg: new FAQ page to replace old one which was hosted on Jyve (but downtime of Jyve is to important to continue so we're now hosting our FAQ, which is probably better anyway as we can have the entries in CVS)

author: vmassol
msg: corrected bug #4563 (http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=4563) + corrected bug in ServletUtil + new test cases so that these bugs will not reappear again :)

author: vmassol
msg: added support for JUnit 3.8 without breaking support for ealier versions of JUnit (Note: JUnit 3.8 removed the name() method - replaced by getName())

author: vmassol
msg: We now need Ant 1.5 (from CVS) and JUnit 3.7 or greater to build Cactus from sources or to run the junit task

author: vmassol
msg: Bob has proposed himself for the enydra task. Welcome aboard Bob ! :)
